title: Awesome notification stopwatch
comment: Serves the needful, neither is too heavy on resources

title: It's not on notification bar
comment: But only on notification drawer. Major bummer :(

title: Superb! Just what I needed. Could you add...
comment: Hi,  Could you please put a "beep when paused"  option, so when paused the app beeps every minute (configurable time). Stock Android Stopwatch had the notification buttons, but they disappeared for some reason. This works nicely. Thanks Developer(s).

title: This app is what i was searching
comment: Simple, clean and showing on the notification bar

title: Countdown!?!
comment: If this app had a countdown timer with alarm....?  EPIC.

title: Great app, just what I was looking for!!
comment: Does just what I need.  I can keep track of breaks at work and still use the device for reading or playing games.  No need to switch windows to see how many minutes are  left!

title: Clean and simple
comment: Really light app that shows stopwatch in notification
